page.title: 16Parish Council,Bitteswell
page.content: Bitteswell Parish council started in 1894.The main offices for the Parish councils of Leicstershire is in Market Harbourgh.Itis known as the District Council. At Bitteswell there is a chairman and a vice chairman as well as other members and a clerk making six altogether.The council is fairly limited in what it can do.for instance they cant give planning permission. one of the jobs of the council is to mow and tend the green.Altough the District council is of higher authouity than the parish council it cant do certain things without the parish councils approval . the parish council have to abide by a book of rules which each council has . The parish council hasnt changed much over the years , although differant members have come in or out . there is a lot more paper work through .
